description.en:
Senyuu comics that Haruhara Robinson uploads to his blog, which range from short omake comics to longer stories. 

[i][b]Table of Contents[/b][/i]

[b]Volume 1: [i]Short Stories[/i][/b]
Fully inked or coloured short comics, usually at least four pages. The comics are disconnected.

[b]Volume 2: [i]One-pagers[/i][/b]
One to three page short comics, mainly drafts and/or storyboards.

[b]Volume 3: [i]SQ Senyuu![/i][/b]
Comics set in the [url=https://mangadex.org/title/10928/senyuu-jump-square-sq]Senyuu SQ[/url] universe. Most are fully inked, but some are in rough draft form.

[b]Volume 4: [i]Everyone's Safe[/i][/b]
Ross, Crea, and Lake as kids in Originia, if nothing ever bad happened there.

[b]Volume 5: [i]A Day Not Too Long After The End of Season 2[/i][/b]
What Ross and Crea got up to at the start of their journey after Season 2. Fully inked.

[b]Volume 6: [i]Alba vs. Creasion[/i] [Complete] [/b]
If Alba faced off against Creasion at the height of his power, who would win? Fully inked.

[b]Volume 7: [i]Crea-kun Has Cheerfully Fallen to the Dark Side[/i] [Complete] [/b]
A three-part series about Crea falling to the "dark side" - but retaining his cheerful personality. Fully inked.
